title: Add test no reply interface
body: Add no reply test interface in server and session. Try to pass through one way gateway

title: [IOTDB-1086] Improve document of Zeppelin installation
body:
If users download Zeppelin directly, the binary package is about 1.5G.

We could give two ways of installation to avoid this big surprise.

The design doc is in https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IOTDB/Query+timeout+design+doc.

[IOTDB-1076] Create interface of TimeIndex
body:
Create interface of `TimeIndex` as `ITimeIndex`, and supply two default implement methods: `DeviceTimeIndex` and `FileTimeIndex`.

Design document: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IOTDB/Interface+design+of+TsFileResource

fix incorrect MetadataException printf info.
body:
fix incorrect MetadataException printf info.
Something as:
error: encoding BOOLEAN does not support TS_2DIFF =>
error: encoding TS_2DIFF does not support BOOLEAN 
because BOOLEAN is not a type of encoding.

title: Allow compression buffer to oversize maxLength during compression and shrink it later
body: Change the previous `maxLength` to a more precise `maxSoftLength`, and allow compression buffer to oversize maxLength during compression and shrink it later, if the adjacent requests are smaller.

title: [IOTDB-1077][rel/0.11]add insertOneDeviceRecords API in java session
debug log always display null in here
body: after `endCurrentChunk()`, currentChunkMetadata is null. so debug log keep displaying null in here.

title: [Draft] Compaction not block merge
ci: JDK 8, JDK 11, JDK 15
[To rel/0.11] [IOTDB-1069] restrict the flushing memtable number to avoid OOM when mem_control is disabled
body: Same as https://github.com/apache/iotdb/pull/2315

title: [IOTDB-1068] Fix Time series metadata cache bug
body:
Currently, we add the entry size each time we put it into cache map. However, if the key already exists in cache, we will add the size again which will cause the cache used size is higher than the actual size.

Also, in this PR, I improve the process of deserializing time series metadata cache from disk.

title: [IOTDB-1069] restrict the flushing memtable number to avoid OOM when mem_control is disabled
body:
To reproduce this bug, 
set JVM memory size to 32GB, 
tsfile_size_threshold=268435456
memtable_size_threshold=268435456
enable_mem_control=false
and insert 200 timeseries to IoTDB.

This pr restricts the flushing memtable size in one TsfileProcessor to one.

title: [To rel/0.11][IOTDB-1068] Improve the time series metadata cache size
body:
Currently, we add the entry size each time we put it into cache map. However, if the key already exists in cache, we will add the size again which will cause the cache used size is higher than the actual size.

Also, in this PR, I improve the process of deserializing time series metadata cache from disk.

title: fix wal buffer size's annotation
Fix a bug of cal MaxDeduplicatedPathNum
body: When cal parameter `MaxDeduplicatedPathNum`, the result of `(totalFreeMemoryForRead.get() / fetchSize) / POINT_ESTIMATED_SIZE` may larger than `Integer.MAX_VALUE`. Which may lead to that `MaxDeduplicatedPathNum` will set to a nagative number, which will reject all `count(*)` query.

title: Fix sync schema bug
body: In pr [#1721](https://github.com/apache/iotdb/pull/1721), a bug of schema synchronization in the sync module is introduced. Which will lead to that the schema can not be loaded correctly on the receiver. This pr solves this problem.

* Add documents: EH and CN
* Remove the duplicate README in zeppelin-interpreter/

To be discussed:
As the Github image website `githubusercontent.com` is unstable, Shall we create an image directory for all used images and refer to them with relative links? just like what ![zeppelin docs](https://github.com/apache/zeppelin/tree/master/docs/assets/themes/zeppelin/img) does.

For example, the images in `UserGuide/Ecosystem Integration/Grafana.md` may not display normally now.

title: Add new committer
Fixed a section number in the sync tool document
Remove extra commas to make the param annotation take effect
Remove useless imports in python client
add ulimit setting message
[To rel/0.11]Add parallelism in timeseries metadata cache
body:
Before, the parallelism in timeseries metadata cache is in device granularity. However, it's not reasonable, because same device in different files should not block each other.
So, we change the granularity to one device in one file.

title: Change parallelism in timeseries metadata cache
body:
Before, the parallelism in timeseries metadata cache is in device granularity. However, it's not reasonable, because same device in different files should not block each other.
So, we change the granularity to one device in one file.

title: Delete update operation
body: Since update operation is not supported in IoTDB now, we'd better remove the code and doc related from IoTDB.

1. Add more tests in monitor and qp module to check the logic of running.
2. Add more comments to explain the exsiting tests.
3. Restructure the structure of some tests, like the package, to help developers easier to find and add tests.

title: IOTDBConnection.java commit
body: Changed error messages as per the issue opened by me.

title: [To rel/0.11] Fix incorrect last result after deleting all data
body:
After deleting all data in a timeseries, execute Last statement gives incorrect output.

```
create timeseries root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature WITH DATATYPE=FLOAT, ENCODING=RLE
insert into root.ln.wf01.wt01(timestamp,temperature) values(200,37.7)
delete from root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature where time < 1000
select last temperature from root.ln.wf01.wt01
```

Incorrect Output:
```
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
|                                   Time|                   timeseries|value|
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
|-292275055-05-17T00.-808:52:48+08:05:43|root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature| null|
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
```

This PR fixed this issue and the result should look like this:

```
+----+----------+-----+
|Time|timeseries|value|
+----+----------+-----+
+----+----------+-----+
```

title: Fix hive-connector CI
body:
Please note the notice in https://spring.io/blog/2020/10/29/notice-of-permissions-changes-to-repo-spring-io-fall-and-winter-2020

Anonymous access using /libs-snapshot or /libs-milestone in the pom.xml, or with these configured in a remote repository, should replace them with /snapshot and /milestone, respectively.

title: Fix for issue # 1804 (Opened by me)
body:
As recommended in the issue and approved by the committee, I will like to make few changes to IOTDB Connection for the issue

see issue: #1804

title: [Distributed] fix client is null cause NullPointerException
body: if the node can not be connected, the server will cause NullPointerException, this pr try to solve the problem.

title: [IOTDB-1060] Support full deletion for delete statement without where clause
body:
This PR supports to delete all data in a timeseries if there is no where clause in delete statements.
```
delete from root.sg.d1.s0
```

title: Fix Last query output when last value does not exist in a series
body:
After deleting all data in a timeseries, execute Last statement gives incorrect output.

```
create timeseries root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature WITH DATATYPE=FLOAT, ENCODING=RLE
insert into root.ln.wf01.wt01(timestamp,temperature) values(200,37.7)
delete from root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature where time < 1000
select last temperature from root.ln.wf01.wt01
```

Incorrect Output:
```
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
|                                   Time|                   timeseries|value|
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
|-292275055-05-17T00.-808:52:48+08:05:43|root.ln.wf01.wt01.temperature| null|
+---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+-----+
```

This PR fixed this issue and the result should be null.

```
+----+----------+-----+
|Time|timeseries|value|
+----+----------+-----+
+----+----------+-----+
```

title: Change null pointer exception log print way in query
body: In Query process, when we meet NullPointerException, it will not print the exception in log_error, it just use e.printStack method which won't be recorded.
